DFProperties.Description: SyncML settings
DM Account
DFProperties.DFTitle: A collection of all SyncML DM accounts

DFProperties.Description: Placeholder for DM Account A maximum of 3 DM accounts is supported. Maximum String Length supported for this node name is 32 characters.
DFProperties.DFTitle: A Unique ID of each DM Account

DFProperties.Description: Maximum String Length supported for this node value is 256 characters. Ex :"http://121.121.121.121/ABC"
DFProperties.DFTitle: Host address of the SyncML server, IP or URL

DFProperties.Description: Maximum String Length supported for this node name is 3 characters. The possible values are : "1" for HTTP ; "2" for WSP ; "3" OBEX
DFProperties.DFTitle: The type of address specified in the Addr node

DFProperties.Description: The value has to be between 1 and 65535
Maximum String Length supported for this node value is 32 characters.
DFProperties.DFTitle: Logical reference to a connectivity node

DFProperties.Description: Maximum String Length supported for this node value is 32 characters.
Maximum String Length supported for this node value is 32 characters.
DFProperties.DFTitle: The password or secret that the server will use to authenticate itself to the client

DFProperties.Description: Maximum String Length supported for this node value is 32 characters.
DFProperties.DFTitle: The next nonce that the server will use to authenticate itself to the client

DFProperties.Description: Maximum String Length supported for this node value is 32 characters.
DFProperties.DFTitle: The username of the device (or user)

DFProperties.Description: Maximum String Length supported for this node value is 32 characters.
DFProperties.DFTitle: The password or secret that the client will use to authenticate itself to the server

DFProperties.Description: Maximum String Length supported for this node value is 32 characters.
DFProperties.DFTitle: The next nonce that the client will use to authenticate itself to the server

DFProperties.Description: Maximum String Length supported for this node value is 32 characters. The value has to be "syncml:auth-basic" or "syncml:auth-MAC" or "syncml:auth-md5"
DFProperties.DFTitle: The authentication type that this server prefers

DFProperties.Description: Maximum String Length supported for this node value is 32 characters.
DFProperties.DFTitle: Displayable name for the SyncML DM settings
A collection of connectivity nodes for SyncML DM

DFProperties.Description: It can support 3 Connectivity nodes Maximum String Length supported for this node value is 32 characters.
DFProperties.DFTitle: A Unique ID of each Connectivity Object

DFProperties.Description: The values should be "1" -WAP "2" -WAP_CONNECTIONLESS "3" -WAP_SECURE "4" -WAP_SECURE_CONNECTIONLESS "5" -HTTP "6" -HTTP_SECURE
The network access point used to connect to a server.
Current Implementation supports CSD and GPRS. Value is "10" for CSD and "11" for GPRS
The current implementation supports "IPV4" only. The value has to be a string representation. The value has to be "1" for IPV4.

If the Bearer is CSD the Maximum String length of this data has to be 32 characters. Ex for CSD Addr: "123-555-1212" If the Bearer is GPRS the Maximum String length of this data has to be 100 characters Ex for GPRS Addr: "http://www.messagelabs.com"
The "name" node for one set of authentication data. The value should be either "PAP" or "CHAP".
DFProperties.DFTitle: One set of authentication data.Id-Secret pair

DFProperties.Description: Maximum String length of this data has to be 32 characters.
Maximum String length of this data has to be 16 characters.
The value has to between 1 and 65535
DFProperties.DFTitle: The port number to use for this proxy or gateway

DFProperties.Description: The current implementation supports "IPV4" only. The value has to be a string representation. The value has to be "1" for IPV4.
The proxy IP or gateway address. The Value has to be a valid IP Address. Ex: "121.121.21.21"

DFProperties.DFTitle: The interior node holding all devinfo objects

DFProperties.Description: A unique device identifier.

DFProperties.DFTitle: The name of the device manufacturer

DFProperties.Description: The name of the device model
The management client revision of the device.
DFProperties.DFTitle: The current management client revision of the device

DFProperties.Description: The current language setting of the device.

DFProperties.DFTitle: The interior node holding all DevDetail nodes

DFProperties.Description: The hardware information of the device.
The software information of the device.
The OTA Software Update information
The URL of the descriptor file for the software update patch
DFProperties.DFTitle: OTA Software Update descriptor file URL

DFProperties.Description: The URL of the descriptor file for the software update patch
DFProperties.DFTitle: Free memory for OTA Software Update

DFProperties.Description: The status information pertaining to a software update process
The bootloader version
The Update Agent version
The update package format version
Specify the downloadable applications, Java, Brew,TrueSync, Phonebook,Datebook, KJava. SMS, MMS, MP3 and native that are currently installed.
Maximum tree depth supported by the device.
Maximum total URI length supported by the device.
Maximum URI segment length supported by the device.
The type of the device.
The name of the device manufacturer.
DFProperties.DFTitle: The name of the device manufacturer device type

DFProperties.Description: The firmware revision of the device.
DFProperties.DFTitle: The current firmware revision of the device

DFProperties.Description: The software revision of the device.
DFProperties.DFTitle: The current software revision of the device

DFProperties.Description: The hardware revision of the device.
DFProperties.DFTitle: The current hardware revision of the device

DFProperties.Description: Large object handling supported if value is true.

DFProperties.DFTitle: The interior node holding all information about Provisioning parameters.
The interior node holding all information about Web Session.

DFProperties.Description: Maximum String Length supported for this node name is 32 characters.
User friendly name of the web session. Maximum string length supported for this node value is 16 characters
DFProperties.DFTitle: Specify User friendly name for Web Session.

DFProperties.Description: The start Page URL for the web session/ Browser. Maximum string length supported for this node value is 100 characters
Inactivity timeout period for a connection. UTF8 string expected values are "1 Minute", "2 Minutes", "5 Minutes", "10 Minutes", "15 Minutes".

DFProperties.DFTitle: Place holder for PXPHYSICAL - this interior node holds information of the gateways.

DFProperties.Description: Maximum String Length supported for this node name is 32 characters.
DFProperties.DFTitle: Unique ID, this node will act as placeholder for one or more gateways or proxyies

DFProperties.Description: This node contains information on the Address of the proxy/gateway UTF8 string. The current implementation supports IPV4 format value only, for eg. 10.1.1.1
AddressType of the proxy/gateway. UTF8 String, the current implementation supports "IPV4" only.
The values should be "1" -WAP "2" -WAP_CONNECTIONLESS "3" -WAP_SECURE "4" -WAP_SECURE_CONNECTIONLESS "5" -HTTP "6" -HTTP_SECURE
This node contains information about the port number on which the service is communicating.(The value has to between 1 and 65535)
Name of the domain (UTF8 string for eg. www.operator.com). Maximum string length supported for this node value is 100 characters.

DFProperties.DFTitle: Place holder for network access point.

DFProperties.Description: Unique ID. Maximum of 3 ID's are allowed. Two for CSD type and one for GPRS type connection. They are: "gprs", "csd0", "csd1"
DFProperties.DFTitle: Only one entry for GPRS is allowed.

DFProperties.Description: This node contains the address of NAP. UTF 8 String for eg 555-1212, 10.1.1.1. For CSD type maximum string length is 32 characters. For GPRS type connection maximum string length is 100 characters.
AddrType of NAP. UTF8 string expected values are "GPRS"/"CSD".
This node contains username information for authentication. UTF 8 string. Maximum string length 32 characters.
This node contains password information for authentication. UTF 8 string. Maximum string length of 16 characters.
This node contains information about the speed of the connection. UTF8 string expected values are "2400bps"/"4800bps"/"9600bps"/"14400bps".
Only for CSD connection. UTF8 string expected values are "Modem"/ "ISDN".
Unique Id for DNS IP Address. The value needs to be in "IPV4" format

DFProperties.DFTitle: The interior node holding all MMS objects

DFProperties.Description: Maximum String Length supported for this node name is 32 characters.
DFProperties.DFTitle: GUID Globally unique ID UTF 8 String

DFProperties.Description: This node contains a reference to the PXLOGICAL GUID, which is required for the MMS application. The Max. value of To-Proxy is 32 characters.
DFProperties.DFTitle: Specify proxy address UTF8 string for eg www.proxy.com.

DFProperties.Description: MMS setting user friendly name. Max string length is 31 characters.
The URL of MSC. UTF8 string for eg www.mmsservername.com Max URI string length is 256 characters.

DFProperties.DFTitle: The interior node holding all Email objects

DFProperties.Description: This node contains the address of NAP. UTF 8 String for eg 555-1212, 10.1.1.1. For CSD type maximum string length is 32 characters. For GPRS type connection maximum string length is 100 characters.
The Max. NAP-UserName is 48 characters.
The Max. NAP-PassWD is 40 characters.
The Max. RecvHost is 20 characters.
The Max. range on the RecvPort is 1 to 65535.
The Max. SendHost is 20 characters.
The Max. range on the SendPort is 1 to 65535.

DFProperties.DFTitle: Protocol type required for receiving mails.Expected Values: "IMAP4", "POP3" only.
E-mail user name Max String length is 48 characters
Email account password Max string length is 40 characters
E-Mail return address. The maximum length of this node is 50 characters, and this has to be a valid Email Address.
